Class.ClassComment: SecurityDomain /** * Pluggable security domain which could be used as a bridge between {@link Authenticator} andWildfly Security Realms. */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Returns {@link Principal} based on user/password combination. * @param username User name. * @param password Password. * @return Principal if authentication was successful. * @throws SecurityException Thrown in case of error or authentication failure. */
